snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan backed the bipartisan tax deal sought by President Obama, aligning him with Speaker John A. Boehner but putting him in conflict with close colleagues.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan's vote in favor of bipartisan tax deal sought by Pres Obama was both pragmatic and political, indicating that he is willing to break from ideology to support Republican Party leadership; it is first in series of votes on budget and deficit reduction measures expected in coming months, all of which have potential to reverberate in race for 2016 Republican presidential nomination.
lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan backed the bipartisan tax deal sought by President Obama, aligning him with Speaker John A. Boehner but putting him in conflict with close colleagues.

headline.seo: Paul Ryan Balances Pragmatism and Politics
headline.main: For Ryan’s Next Act, Balancing Pragmatism With Politics
headline.print_headline: For Ryan’s Next Act, Balancing Pragmatism With Politics
